title: Gracias, Taylor y Travis. Lo necesitaba
description: Quizá la noticia es un nuevo paradigma para la vieja unión de un atleta masculino con una bella estrella femenina.
content:
Probablemente ya te habrás enterado de la noticia, o tal vez solo de los chillidos de alegría que emanan de TikTok o de las Swifties de tu barrio: el martes, Travis Kelce y Taylor Swift, la estrella de fútbol americano de los Kansas City Chiefs y la princesa del pop multiplatino (o, como la feliz pareja se refiere a sí misma, “tu maestra de inglés y tu profesor de gimnasia”) anunciaron su compromiso.

La noticia no fue una sorpresa inesperada. Por un lado, la pareja lleva saliendo dos años. Por otro, el anuncio fue tan cuidadosamente coreografiado, con una preparación tan larga y deliberada y un plan tan obviamente elaborado para conseguir la máxima saturación mediática, que bien podría haber sido el plan de relaciones públicas de una película de verano.

Primero salió el número de septiembre de GQ, con Kelce en portada. Después, Swift se unió a él en New Heights, el pódcast que presenta con su hermano Jason, que batió el récord mundial de visitas simultáneas para un pódcast en YouTube. También dio una primicia al anunciar el título y la fecha de lanzamiento de su próximo álbum, The Life of a Showgirl. Por último, el martes por la tarde, la pareja rompió internet al publicar fotos de su compromiso en cada una de sus cuentas de Instagram.
translation:
You will probably have learned about the news, or maybe just the chillidos of joy emanating from Tiktok or the swifties of your neighborhood: on Tuesday, Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift, the American football star of the Kansas City Chiefs and the Princess of the Multiplatino Pop (or, as the happy couple refers to itself, “your English teacher and your teacher of English and your teacher of English and your teacher of English and your teacher of English and your teacher of English Gymnastics ”) announced their commitment.

The news was not an unexpected surprise. On the one hand, the couple has been leaving two years. On the other, the announcement was so carefully choreographed, with such a long and deliberate preparation and a plan so obviously prepared to achieve maximum media saturation, which could well have been the public relations plan of a summer film.

First, GQ September, with Kelce on the cover. Then, Swift joined him in New Heights, the podcast he presents with his brother Jason, who beat the world record of simultaneous visits for a Pódcast on YouTube. He also gave a first to announce the title and release date of his next album, The Life of A Showgirl. Finally, on Tuesday afternoon, the couple broke the Internet by publishing photos of their commitment in each of their Instagram accounts.
translatedTitle: Thanks, Taylor and Travis. I needed it
translatedDescription: Perhaps the news is a new paradigm for the old union of a male athlete with a beautiful female star.
translatedSummary: On Tuesday, Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift, the American football star of the Kansas City Chiefs and the Princess of the Multiplatino Pop, announced their commitment to each other. The couple's announcement was not unexpected, with their carefully choreographed announcement being made before and after. They also published photos of their commitment on their Instagram accounts.
argos_summary: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift announced their engagement after two years together, following a meticulously planned media rollout that included a GQ September cover, a joint podcast appearance, a preview of Swift’s upcoming album, and Instagram photos that sparked viral excitement.
